title: Popular JavaScript Array Methods
description: JavaScript provides a wide range of methods that can be used to manipulate and work with arrays. Here are some commonly used array methods in JavaScript

details.description: This method creates a new array with the results of calling a provided function on every element in the calling array. It does not modify the original array.
This method creates a new array with all elements that pass the test implemented by the provided function. It does not modify the original array.
This method applies a function against an accumulator and each element in the array (from left to right) to reduce it to a single value. It does not modify the original array.
